A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Humor was forced and not funny. 
The story was poorly written. 
The Director/ Writer - Rian Johnson and Disney have invested more time and money into damage control marketing/ promoting this underdeveloped movie\, when they should have invested the time in developing the story.

The theatre experience is depressing; no laughs\, no oohs and ahhs...and no applause at the end. 

Wait for the digital rental and see for yourself.
